remarks: Rearrangement of lattice join of 4 classes.  Frequently-used special case of ~ latj4 for atoms.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Aug-2012.)
statement:
hlatjcom.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
hlatjcom.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
hlatj4 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ ( R e. A /\ S e. A ) ) -> ( ( P .\/ Q ) .\/ ( R .\/ S ) ) = ( ( P .\/ R ) .\/ ( Q .\/ S ) ) ) $.
